business: Brokers the services of bodyguards and inquisitives
Specialize in risk assessment and management protecting clients from both physical and social threats
characteristics: More interested in helping their communities than in raw profit
Often work with local law enforcement or help those who can’t afford their services
prompts: Are you a part of House Medani? If so, do you bear the Mark of Detection? Or do you bear the Mark without being a member of the House?
If you are in the house, what is your role? What is your opinion of the House?
Where you exiled from your house?
How do you use your mark if you have one?
Do you work as a detective or inquisitive?
Do you seek out justice at all costs?
racePrompts: Where you parents born in a Khoravar (Half-Elf) community, or were they members of different races?
Is your half-elf identity a source of pride, a simple fact of life, or something that has been difficult for you?
Are you a part of the detective House of Medani or bear the Mark of Detection?
Are you a part of the transportation House of Lyrandar or bear the Mark of Storm?
